duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage and control assigned construction projects, overseeing field operations, site safety, productivity, schedule, and quality work.
Coordinate with the Project Manager to lead the project team and ensure effective project management.
Provide technical expertise and develop jobsite logistics plans during the pre-construction process.
Review building plans and specifications, and participate in the constructibility review.
Manage day-to-day operations at the jobsite, including sequencing of work, logistics, and safety.
Create detailed logs and daily reports of construction activities and advise the project team of issues or deficiencies.
Understand and enforce safety standards, ensuring a safe and secure jobsite at all times.
Maintain positive relationships with the Owner, architect, and other project stakeholders throughout the project(s).

education_certification.credential: High School and completion of Vocational School (College degree preferred)
